name: Project.99_1612
description:
Gather every month. Make experimental games.Pack them all. And sell it for 0.99 USD.This month we made 2 games.
[Fingers Crossed] by Jaewon Yoo, Sun Park, Jooeun Hwang


Slide your fingers on the keyboard like using a touch screen.

Please note that the game may remove your fingerprints.

* You need a QWERTY keyboard, and 2 players (or 2 fingers).

* Laptop keyboard recommended.



[FileGame] by Jaehyun Yoo


Be aware of what your computer can do.

* This game only works on OS X
